welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Vittuone, a charming city known for its rich history and scenic beauty. We invite you to immerse yourselves in the local culture and explore all that our wonderful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, primarily serving low-cost and charter airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linate Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Linate Airport, mainly used for charter and low-cost flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login with personal information.
